name: a letter of challenge
description:
languages: english / 日本語

~

you get a mysterious letter of challenge! who could it be from...?

~

A LETTER OF CHALLENGE is a battle game (?) & visual novel where you play as a magical girl (with a magical guardian, of course!). you're heading home from school one day when you get a mysterious letter... find out who sent it and why!

play time is ~20 minutes.

this game was made for summer slow jams june 2020: turn-based games.

the game is free, but if you pay $3 or more, you can support me in my game-making adventures & also receive a digital art collection that includes all art from the game along with design sketches!
